responses.rationale: The segment describes the location of cases using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports confirmed cases using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment states the number of states with confirmed cases using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment describes the mechanism of spread using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment uses 'infected' and 'forcing the killing', which are not high-potency verbs as defined in Q2.
The segment states the number of birds killed using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment states the number of birds killed in Iowa using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides background information using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides background information using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
